title: Literature on design of Cyrillic Alphabets, anyone?
content:
Hi all,

Can anyone suggest good literature about cyrillic type design. Looking at today's designs as well the development of cyrillic alphabets in the past.

Thanks,

comments.content:
[Cyrillic How-to](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013203451/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Cyrillic%20How-to)
